timeline.message:
Add ADT Event Route e2e tests

Fix a small issue with Models sync test using the wrong logger. Also removed an incorrect session record (name has Lifcycle instead of Lifecycle)

Add ADT Event Route e2e tests

Fix a small issue with Models sync test using the wrong logger. Also removed an incorrect session record (name has Lifcycle instead of Lifecycle)

replies.bodyText: Yeah, the title of this file is incorrect, and it doesn't correspond to a test that we have. We still have the "componentLifecycleTest.json" file
replies.author: timtay-microsoft

timeline.bodyText: how do you feel about using assertj's fluent assertions here?
timeline.author: abhipsaMisra

replies.bodyText: I'm not sure that would simplify anything in this case. Am I missing something though?
replies.author: timtay-microsoft

replies.bodyText: I feel it is more readable, and adds better context to the assertion being done.
replies.author: abhipsaMisra

replies.bodyText:
You could also do something like:
assertThat(actual).extracting("id", "endpointName", "filter")
                 .doesNotContainNull()
                 .containsExactly(expectedId, expected.getEndpointName(), expected.getFilter());
replies.author: abhipsaMisra
